Luke Ho, Kick-Ass Financial Services Consultant at Trillion Financial PlannersLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Jul 2019You should have all of your basic insurances first -
1) Your health insurance (shield upgrades)2) Your Life/TPD (total and permanent disability) insurance3) Your Critical Illness Insurance4) Optional: Personal Accident or Disability InsuranceYou may want to get a package for that kind of travel insurance with a high credit rating insurance company since it is for 6 whole months - it could potentially be cheaper than a non-package, especially if you are bringing someone with you.
